tree.name: Domantas Sabonis
tree.tradeDescription: Kings traded Haliburton, Hield, and Thompson to Pacers for Sabonis, Justin Holiday, Jeremy Lamb, and 2023 2nd (Jordan Walsh)
tree.note: All-Star center, originally drafted 11th overall by Orlando in 2016

assetsGivenUp.name: Tyrese Haliburton
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard drafted 12th overall from Iowa State

assetsGivenUp.name: Buddy Hield
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Kings traded DeMarcus Cousins and Omri Casspi to Pelicans for Hield, Tyreke Evans, Langston Galloway, 2017 1st (Zach Collins), and 2017 2nd (Frank Mason III)
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally drafted 6th overall by New Orleans in 2016

assetsGivenUp.name: Omri Casspi
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran forward, returned to Kings as free agent

assetsGivenUp.name: Tristan Thompson
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: SAC sent Delon Wright to ATL; BOS sent Tristan Thompson to SAC; ATL sent Kris Dunn, Bruno Fernando, and 2023 2nd to BOS
